CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL(Sale_Price__c), Terminal_PED_Docking_unit_per_device__c + Terminal_PED_Purchase_unit_per_device__c + P2PE_license_fee_per_device__c + Software_license_fee_per_device__c + Terminal_PED_Set_up_fee_per_device__c + Set_up_fee_per_SIM__c, Terminal_PED_Docking_unit_per_device__c + Terminal_PED_Purchase_unit_per_device__c + P2PE_license_fee_per_device__c + Software_license_fee_per_device__c + Terminal_PED_Set_up_fee_per_device__c + Set_up_fee_per_SIM__c + Sale_Price__c ) * Quantity__c
CustomField.label: One Off Cost
